long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now YOU can talk like The Greatest of All Time! This is a fun chrome extension that does just that and changes a web page's color scheme to Oakland A's colors! It's so much fun! I don't know why Google keeps removing it! I love Google so much!
